alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Manatee and central Hillsborough Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Temple Terrace to near Parrish. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Lutz, Brandon, Fish Hawk, Greater Sun Center, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Egypt Lake-Leto, Greater Carrollwood, Riverview, University, Parrish, Greater Northdale, Macdill Air Force Base, Citrus Park, Lake Magdalene, Ruskin and Gandy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee
